src:
国行截至10月31日国际储备金滑至1032亿美元
07 Nov 2019, 07:20 by theedgemarkets.com
（吉隆坡7日讯）国家银行宣布，截至10月31日的国际储备金下滑1亿美元或0.1%至1032亿美元，相比10月15日的1033亿美元。
国行今日发布文告指出，储备金水平足以应付7.6个月的进口和1.1倍的短期外债。
其中，占最大部分的外汇储备从967亿令吉，增至968亿美元，而国际货币基金组织（IMF）储备及特别提款权（SDR）各为11亿美元、黄金达19亿美元，与前两周保持不变，而其他储备资产由25亿美元，跌至23亿美元。
截至10月31日，国行总资产由4601亿9000万令吉，降至4586亿3000万令吉，流通货币从1089亿1000万令吉，增至1099亿7000万令吉。
（编译：陈慧珊）

English version：
Bank Negara int'l reserves slips to US$103.2b as at Oct 31

Via theedgemarkets.com
text:
As of October 31, the Bank’s international reserves slipped to US$103.2 billion.
07 Nov 2019, 07:20 by theedgemarkets.com
KUALA LUMPUR (Reuters) - The National Bank announced that its international reserves fell by $100 million or 0.1% to $103.2 billion as of October 31, compared to $103.3 billion on October 15.
The Bank of China issued a statement today stating that the reserve level is sufficient to cover 7.6 months of imports and 1.1 times of short-term external debt.
Among them, the largest portion of foreign exchange reserves increased from RM96.7 billion to $96.8 billion, while the International Monetary Fund (IMF) reserves and special drawing rights (SDR) each stood at $1.1 billion and gold reached $1.9 billion. Two weeks remained unchanged, while other reserve assets fell from $2.5 billion to $2.3 billion.
As of October 31, the total assets of the Bank of China decreased from RM460.09 billion to RM58.86 billion, and the circulating currency increased from RM108.9 billion to RM1,199.70 million.
(Compile: Chen Huishan)

English version:
Bank Negara int'l reserves slips to US$103.2b as at Oct 31

Via theedgemarkets.com
